title: Clara Barton National Historic Site: Multimedia Presentations
body: Multimedia Presentations       Marian Moser Jones, author of The American Red Cross From Clara Barton to the New Deal, presented an inspiring program in the Center Hall of Clara Barton National Historic Site on April 12, 2014. (the 102nd anniversary of Clara Barton's death)        Marian Moser Jones speaks in the center hall of Clara Barton National Historic Site.  The original doors for Clara Barton's American Red Cross office are behind her. photo courtesy of Laura J. Dugan  It is posted on YouTube in three parts. Part 1 Part 2 Part 3             Find Your Park : Clara Barton National Historic Site   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:1 minute, 58 seconds  High school student Clara Ferrari found her park just a few blocks from where she lives. Here's her story:
